Example "EarlobeOutputData" class.

Example implementation for example EarlobeOutputData class.

// earlobeoutputdata.cpp

#include "earlobeoutputdata.h"

using namespace sm::eod;

COREDATA_DEFINE_THIS_OBJECT_ID(sm::eod::EarlobeOutputData);

// Virtual constructor
/* Return a shared pointer to an object of this type, created on the heap */
static sm::eod::SerializablePtr EarlobeOutputData::create()
{
    return sm::eod::SerializablePtr(new EarlobeOutputData);
}

// Default constructor
EarlobeOutputData::EarlobeOutputData()
: EngineOutputBase()
, _earlobe_position(ARRAY_SIZE_3D_DATA, 0)
{
}

// Copy constructor
EarlobeOutputData::EarlobeOutputData(const EarlobeOutputData& rhs) 
: EngineOutputBase(rhs)
, _earlobe_position()
{
    copyFrom(rhs);
}

// Destructor
EarlobeOutputData::~EarlobeOutputData()
{
}

// Assignment operator
EarlobeOutputData& EarlobeOutputData::operator=(const EarlobeOutputData& rhs)
{
    if (this != &rhs)
    {
        EngineOutputBase::operator=(rhs);
        copyFrom(rhs);
    }
    return *this;
}
    
// Return a copy of this object, allocated on the heap
EarlobeOutputData* EarlobeOutputData::clone() const
{
    return new EarlobeOutputData(*this);
}

// Return the unique object ID
ObjectID EarlobeOutputData::objectID() const
{
    return EarlobeOutputData::THIS_OBJECT_ID;
}
  
// See EngineOutputBase
void EarlobeOutputData::appendEngineSpecificData(std::vector<uint8>& buffer) const
{
    assert(_earlobe_position.size() == ARRAY_SIZE_3D_DATA);             
    Serializable::appendBuffer(buffer, &_earlobe_position[0], 3);               
}

// See EngineOutputBase
void EarlobeOutputData::readEngineSpecificData(const std::vector<uint8>& buffer, int& read_pos)
{
    assert(_earlobe_position.size() == ARRAY_SIZE_3D_DATA);                 
    Serializable::readBuffer(buffer, read_pos, &_earlobe_position[0], 3);
}

// See EngineOutputBase
uint32 EarlobeOutputData::numEngineSpecificDataBytes() const
{
    return ( ARRAY_SIZE_3D_DATA*sizeof(double));
}

// See SerializableComposite
void EarlobeOutputData::printOwnData(std::ostream& s) const
{
    assert(_earlobe_position.size() == ARRAY_SIZE_3D_DATA);
    writeField(s, _earlobe_position[0]);
    writeField(s, _earlobe_position[1]);
    writeField(s, _earlobe_position[2]);        
} 
           
// See SerializableComposite
void EarlobeOutputData::printOwnHeader(std::ostream& s) const
{
    writeField(s, "EARLOBE_POS_X");
    writeField(s, "EARLOBE_POS_Y");
    writeField(s, "EARLOBE_POS_Z"); 
}                                                 

// Copy the data from rhs into this object
void EarlobeOutputData::copyFrom(const EarlobeOutputData& rhs)
{
    _earlobe_position = rhs._earlobe_position;  
}
